bibl.title: Christian Oxyrhynchus. Texts, Documents, and Sources.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Christian literary papyri from Oxyrhynchus: New Testament texts [Nos 1-52]; - Extracanonical texts [Nos 53-78]; - Other Christian literary texts [Nos 79-105]. - 3. Documentary papyri and Christianity at Oxyrhynchus: Decian libelli [Nos 106-109]; - Christian references in third-century documentary texts [Nos 110-113]; - Christian references in fourth-century documentary texts [Nos 114-128]; - Letters written by Christians from the third and fourth centuries [Nos 129-162]. - 4. Patristic, Coptic, and other sources on Christians and Christianity at Oxyrhynchus [Nos 163-175]. - Bibliography. Indexes
